leqA.title: Leq A
leqA.description: Average over set Leq time. Between the current measurement and current measurement time minus Leq time.

leqC.title: Leq C
leqC.description: Average over set Leq time. Between the current measurement and current measurement time minus Leq time.

positivePeakHoldA.title: Positive peak hold A
positivePeakHoldA.description: The highest dB(A) value in the period between previous measurement and current measurement

negativePeakHoldA.title: Negative peak hold A
negativePeakHoldA.description: The lowest dB(A) value in the period between previous measurement and current measurement

positivePeakHoldC.title: Positive peak hold C
positivePeakHoldC.description: The highest dB(C) value in the period between previous measurement and current measurement

negativePeakHoldC.title: Negative peak hold C
negativePeakHoldC.description: The lowest dB(C) value in the period between previous measurement and current measurement
